scripts.assets:prepare: mkdir -p dist && cp slides/uofs-logo.png dist/uofs-logo.png && cp slides/godot_architecture.png dist/godot_architecture.png && rm -rf dist/scripts && cp -R slides/scripts dist/
scripts.marp:watch: npm run assets:prepare && marp -w slides/deck.md --html --allow-local-files --theme-set slides/theme.css --output dist/deck.html
scripts.marp:build: npm run assets:prepare && marp slides/deck.md --html --allow-local-files --theme-set slides/theme.css --output dist/deck.html
scripts.marp:pdf: npm run assets:prepare && marp slides/deck.md --pdf --allow-local-files --theme-set slides/theme.css --output dist/deck.pdf
scripts.marp:pptx: npm run assets:prepare && marp slides/deck.md --pptx --allow-local-files --theme-set slides/theme.css --output dist/deck.pptx
